body_html: @apaszke You can share pinned memory between processes using shared memory segments. Each process has to cudaHostRegister this memory to be able to use it as pinned (and cudaHostUnregister it). We are doing this e.g. in multi-process version of nccl, you can take a look at https://github.com/NVIDIA/nccl/blob/master/src/core.cu
